body:
@wynntastic
You're right, PD doesn't have that skill. I guess she used a Joint Penalty scroll — back in 2016 (when this book was drawn) Linker was in the Wizard tree and so was Enchanter. Not sure if that's still possible, as Enchanter lost their attribute to make skill scrolls when both were moved to the Scout tree and I haven't played since...
Idk what this us based on, but I like it
What does the ToSLdan-san in the end means? I assume ToS means tree of savior, what about Ldan?
actually, plague doctors are healers and don't have access to joint penalty, linkers (scouts) do
